Title: Relates to establishing a process for neutral arbitrators to review certain disciplinary decisions and penalties imposed on members of the New York city police department
Summary: Establishes a process for neutral arbitrators to review certain disciplinary decisions and penalties imposed on members of the New York city police department.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing a process for neutral arbitrators to review certain disciplinary decisions and penalties imposed on members of the New York city police department
